website_summaries.verdict: A moisturizing conditioner that works well for most types of curls, and can be used daily without weighing hair down.
pros: Moisturizes dry hair without feeling tacky or heavy
Contains protein that nourishes hair and does a good job reducing frizz
Locks in a defined look without feeling "crunchy."
Great for loose and tight curls, and coarse hair
cons: Doesn't provide deep moisturizing for seriously damaged hair
Mixed opinions on the scent – some like it, some found it too "perfumey

customer_reviews.title: Pair with good mousse
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing and saved my hair from looking like a frizzy mess. It dries stiff in spots but can easily be fixed by scrunching your hair with a towel (preferably damp) to break up that stiffness. I put it in my wet hair and let it dry halfway before putting a good mousse in as well, and it is the one thing that's stopping me from going back for another perm. I love it and it lasts. The 4 stars is for the stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Dried out my hair and it broke off terribly. Still have more than half the bottle left
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product cause it was suggested by my hair stylist. To heavy for my hair left it weighed down. Dried out my hair and it broke off terribly. Still have more than half the bottle left. Will not by this product again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shereka

customer_reviews.title: Great curls but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended after seeing a girl with super cute bouncy curls with no frizz but when I used it, my hair is still frizzy on top and I'm not a big fan. I like a more natural feel to my curls and this gave it kind of a weird, crunchy feel. Also, had to use quite a bit of product to get through my long hair that doesn't hold up the next day when I don't wash my hair and don't want to put that much more product in my hair. Won't buy again. May be better suited for shorter hair.
customer_reviews.author: C Sauseda

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: My short, fine hair has a body problem. This solves it and keeps going! No other product could get me out the door before going flat. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: PeaceCorpsMeri

customer_reviews.title: Helps make my hair curlier!
customer_reviews.text: Hated my curly hair growing up in the 70s but now that my hair is graying I needed more body. I tried this and it works great. In fact, the first time I used this product and then curled my hair, the next morning when I removed the curlers I looked like Little Orphan Annie my hair was so curly! After styling, the curls lasted for two days! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Globat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for styling
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Ouidad Products for my curly hair. I have used the moisturizing cream and still do, but this styling gel helps to moisturize as well as hold without being crunchy or making hair stiff.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Happy curls!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used several of the Ouidad products for many years. I consider them the very best for curly hair. I bought this gel to try on place of their Tress Effects which is excellent for separating your curls. I think I like this better. Has. All the same benefits as the T.E. plus much more moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: NannerJ

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to anyone with very curly hair
customer_reviews.text: My long curly hair absolutely loves this product. With a little Ouidad No Rinse Conditioner and Ouidad Curl Quencher, my spiral curls on bouncy and soft. Highly recommend this product to anyone with very curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Atkin

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: By far the best gel for curly hair. Leaves your hair feeling soft but still has great hold and shape. I found that I use more than I did with other products. I recommend watching the Quidad videos since it is not applied the way I was used to with other product lines.
customer_reviews.author: Cmadd

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I hate spending a lot of money on hair products
customer_reviews.text: I have out of control unpredictable curly hair. I went to a new salon where they used it and it was the first time in 30 years my hair wasn't a total disaster. I have to say I hate spending a lot of money on hair products, but this is 100% worth it. It's lightweight, consistent and looks great. The price is a bit of a challenge so I intersperse my days with mousse and gels, etc but when I know my hair needs to look good I know I can rely on ouidad!
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Finally found something that doesn't make my scalp itch.
customer_reviews.text: Makes nice curls in my short 3B hair even when there is no humidity. Doesn't have the preservatives that make my scalp itch like many other products. I gave up on finding a mousse that doesn't have itchy chemicals and still works.
customer_reviews.author: Zipper

customer_reviews.title: will never buy, product lied
customer_reviews.text: Just tried all of the product and all of them had my hair worse than when I started. I will never purchased. I can understand why you might not take them all back due to the time frame a person will try the product. But, they are hard on curly hair and scalp.
customer_reviews.author: C L-Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: Makes curls smooth and manageable. My hair looked better each passing day after using, until it was time to wash again.
customer_reviews.author: Mumzee

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work on my thin, wavy graying hair. Made my hair absolutely flat and greasy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Tempered Clavier

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this was really gel ?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not convinced that there was really gel in the bottle. It is soapy and bubbly and more like shampoo although the label reads gel. I’ve been using this specific product for more than six or seven years and it took forever to get to me and when you put it in your hair it gets all soapy like shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ursone

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This ‘curl specific’ product is no better than any other curl product and at at $20 a bottle? Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to spend a ton of money on hair products, but I must say this was worth every penny! It gives my hair definition and holds the curls through to my next wash day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves the curls
customer_reviews.text: So far love it. It makes my hair soft yet holds it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica h.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! This product. I have naturally curl hair. I am currently let my hair grow, and the curl quencher is excellent for taming my big hair and frizziness. I would recommend this product to any one that has natural, curly, or kinky hair that's trying to control the curl and puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: ladybell86

customer_reviews.title: Great product, perfect for naturally curly hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally curly hair and I have tried everything out there, this product is fantastic! I do combine it with one other item and I use a special shampoo & conditioner for curly hair specifically but this product finishes off my look. It has great hold with out leaving my hair stiff or sticky. It's not your typical gel because it keeps my curls soft and bouncy not still or crunchy which is what most gels out there will do. There is no frizz and my hair has never looked so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Need to follow the directions to get the curls you want.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and works well if used properly. I don't use a hairdryer. I air dry my hair from wet. I want to buy the cream version next time because I have dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is okay. Only need to use the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay. Only need to use the size of pea for shoulder length hair, or else globby!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mary Ballantyne

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok works on thick dry hair I think . I can’t use it .
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing, doesn't dry my hair out.
customer_reviews.text: Like this product very much. It doesnt dry my hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry V

customer_reviews.title: This Gel is A-MA-ZING!
customer_reviews.text: I was spectacle at first, but this gel is a miracle! I have really curly hair and have tried everything under the sun! I've lately been using DevaCare for washing/conditioning (which rock!), but was lacking a good get. This gel keeps your curls together and soft. I'm sold; this will be my gel for the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Good slip
customer_reviews.text: I have 3b and 3c girls. This gel had a lot of slip so it was easy to distribute through my hair. The gold was good but soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a light gel with hold that doesn't make your hair hard this is the right product. I have curly hair and this gel keeps my hair from being frizzy without weighing my hair down. I love it and plan on trying other products by Ouidad.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: heard great things but I wasn't a fan
customer_reviews.text: It was very watery....heard great things but I wasn't a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Christina DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This stuff leaves my hair frizzy, won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: my favorite leave in conditioner and if I'm away and don't ...
customer_reviews.text: repeat buy, my favorite leave in conditioner and if I'm away and don't have it, I miss it
customer_reviews.author: joan mamelok

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: It works great! My hair stays curly all day long.
customer_reviews.author: 200books

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel, it's the only one that works on my fine curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Forest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curly, dry hair!
customer_reviews.text: Like what it does to my curly, coarse hair. Wish it was price cheaper. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the softest gel for my hair out there ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the softest gel for my hair out there. It really holds too. Even my husband uses this as regular gel.
customer_reviews.author: CTmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product, doesn't leave oily looking hair. Helps define curls.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Norberg

customer_reviews.title: Another failure!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive product that dry my curls and leave them worse than if I use a cheap one!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea MR

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this gel for years. It is the only curly-hair product that does not create that crunchy, stiff curl. It allows my curls to move and bounce. This product comes highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Oddisey Knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best curly hair products around, and I have tried them all!
customer_reviews.author: Iphigenia

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for winter when my curls need extra moisture and there's less need for frizz control.
customer_reviews.author: D Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Holds curls well
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but seems to leave my hair dry. Holds curls VERY WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Cormiere V Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this all the time. She swears by it. I know see the results.Her has has nice body and more curls.
customer_reviews.author: Brent M. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is nice and light on your hair. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly the same product as sold in the salon. will certainly purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Fênix

customer_reviews.title: Quidad works
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite gel for my curly hair. I mix it with a drop or two of hair oil to keep my hair frizz free.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: this hair product works well for curly/wavy hair. I like it more than Oidad's humidity and moisture control similar product
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: ... she loves this product - she says it's the best she's used
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has curly/kinky hair and she loves this product - she says it's the best she's used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: The only gel I use on my coarse, curly hair!
customer_reviews.author: brandyfh33

customer_reviews.title: Too heavily perfumed
customer_reviews.text: Works okay but hate the strong smell - way too perfumed for me.
customer_reviews.author: moonpub

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time user of this product but found this last purchase to be a little different and disappointing. It's still a good product but it seems to dry out my hair more than I remember.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the only product that controls my hair without making it hard. My favorite product thus far. Shipped quickly too
customer_reviews.author: ymc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Hair does not feel stiff. It stays styled and soft to the touch. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: katyubs

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing and I will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and I will be buying again. I have really curly hair and it tames my frizz amazingly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great curly hair product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for my curly hair! The only time is doesn't work is when I don't use enough of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of the Ouidad hair care products ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the Ouidad hair care products. This one misses the mark with me. It's too sticky and doesn't work as well as Whipped Curls or Heat and Humidity Control.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It's not sticky or crunchy when it dries. I found it to hold well and could be refreshed the next day with a little water. Pleasant smell. A great gel for curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shar Frager

customer_reviews.title: No thanks!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry, course, wavy/curly hair. I normally use Sebastian Potion #9 (awesome!), but thought I would try this for a change. It seemed to dry out my hair, and did not help the curls form. It did nothing for me. I think it might be better suited for someone with normal, soft hair with curls that needs just a lightweight gel-type styling aid.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie E

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product, if you don't mind some crunchy-ness
customer_reviews.text: As a newbie to the natural approach, this product was the first one I tried. I don't mind a mild crunch factor, so I like this product. The curls come forth, and my hair has a defined wet-look. The downside is that your hair will be more dry than with the Jane Carter Curl cream, which I tried after Ouidad. Although I like Ouidad, the moisture factor will mostly likely lead me to Jane's product more often.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3B/C curls
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly when paired with the Moisture Lock Leave In Conditioner. Smells great. Leaves hair defined and soft. I've been using this product for 5 years. It's consistently great. I've tried other styling gels like Deva Curl (smells great, curls are defined but hair feels dry) and Shea Moisture (smells great but product is heavy and causes break outs). Ouidad is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: My hair has never looked better!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to Ouidad products by my hairdresser who specializes in curly hair. My hair has never looked better! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: BecMac2015

customer_reviews.title: Good gel
customer_reviews.text: I like its flexible hold and will buy this product again. I like that it doesn't leave you with crispy hair. I use it with a diffuser and I definitely works best on wet hair. It doesn't last all day. I have to add more gel after 8 hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: Heisha

customer_reviews.title: great product! i have thick wavy hair it keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: great product ! i have thick wavy hair it keeps it manageable & they improved the scent its really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mitterando

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work for me, 99% of this bottle left over and sitting on a shelf
customer_reviews.author: oren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great conditioner for curly hair. Been using it for over 10 years
customer_reviews.author: Earth School

customer_reviews.title: Works great - but Gives me fungus
customer_reviews.text: Results look great on my hair. But I always break out in a fungus on my fingers whenever I use it. So sad cuz it is difficult to find the perfect product for your hair. Ah, well. I have to discontinue using it. and I cannot recommend it. p.s. what's in that stuff that causes fungus?
customer_reviews.author: Farley V. Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product seems more watery than the last one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Curly hair products
customer_reviews.text: Never tried Ouidad products before. Always wanted to. I have very curly hair and I went on the Ouidad.com website before ordering these products. Website tells you what products to use by the type of curl you have. I bought the shampoo conditioner curl cream and gel. All work great. Left my hair soft and manageable. Love this company’s products.
customer_reviews.author: Daisymandi

customer_reviews.title: I have used Ouidad products on my fine curly hair and none them have disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: I have used Ouidad products on my fine curly hair and none them have disappointed me. I am the least brand loyal person you could meet. Many products for curly hair are heavy and leave too product on the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Norwich Fan

product_meta.title: Curl Quencher Moisturizing Styling Gel
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 OunceWhen you put effort into perfecting your curls, you want your style to last. It's all a matter of choosing the right product to help your frizz-free curls go the distance.

We developed our VitalCurl Tress Effects Styling Gel to help curly hair form perfect spirals, while keeping frizz at bay all day. With Hydrolyzed Collagen, Pro-Vitamin B5, and Clove Oil, our strongest hold gel helps to seal in the optimal amount of moisture for consistent, defined curls. And when refreshed with water, our Memory Interlock technology works to reform the definition of your curls. You'll get maximum mileage out of your style, with every curl hydrated on the inside and smooth and shiny on the outside. Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Alcohol Denat, Glycerin, Dimethicone PEG-8 Meadowfoamate, Polysorbate 20, PVP, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Panthenol (Provitamin B5), Butylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum).

BRAND STORY
Ouidad is the original curl expert with one iconic idea — let curls be curls. For over 30 years, we’ve perfected a unique customized approach for each curl type: Loose, Classic, Tight, and Kinky curls.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
